abstract: The 2015 Gilder Lehrman Lincoln Prize is being awarded to Harold Holzer for his book “Lincoln and the Power of the Press: The War for Public Opinion.”

headline.main: Lincoln Prize Goes to Harold Holzer

snippet: The 2015 Gilder Lehrman Lincoln Prize is being awarded to Harold Holzer for his book “Lincoln and the Power of the Press: The War for Public Opinion.”
